title: Spider Webs & Glass-Blowing Classes
itunes:author: Guest: Debra Fileta
itunes:summary:
When you're engaged, it's easy to think you know your future spouse really well. However, getting to know someone takes time. John talks with Greg and Erin about how engaged couples can develop a healthy friendship before a wedding. Featuring Debra Fileta.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Debra Fileta's book "Love in Every Season: Understanding the Four Stages of Every Healthy Relationship" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-10-26?refcd=1289601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/spider-webs-glass-blowing-classes/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
